questions.quote: Well, it's a possibility, like you said! Stranger things have happened! Thank you, Elaine. Thank you.
. . . Years. Many years , um,  we've been close friends and then recently something just you know *ehghh* happened.
I know it looks bleak. I've been there. Ten years ago waking up in bed next to a woman like this would've sent me running for the Phisohex.
Just dropped in for a visit. You, uh, you never called me back.
Whatever!!. . . . Oh oh oh this is unbelievable. This is better than my bed at home.
You know George they are doing wonderful things at mental institutions these days. I'd be happy to set-up a meet and greet.
So, how did you get up there?Â  Did you say you had to use the bathroom?
Wait a second.  This'll scare 'em off.  Well, good night, Ollie.
Yeah. He thinks he saw the devil. He won't leave his room in the church basement.
I don't know if you people are aware of this, but I am one clever chickadee.
